string.text: Leupold D-EVO Offset Optic w/ LCO Red Dot

%c[ui_gray_1]A unique, innovative design allows the 6x20mm D-EVO to be paired perfectly with the Leupold Carbine Optic (LCO), or virtually any red dot sight, to deliver a bold aiming point for reflexive shots and a magnified image for long-range precision with the mere movement of your eye.
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_1]6x

%c[ui_gray_1]A telescopic sight developed in the 1800s, designed to be mounted onto Winchester style rifles. Finding these scopes in usable condition is a rare thing in the modern world. This is only a replica, but it still works.
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_1]3.5x
Sig Sauer ROMEO 4 Red Dot Sight

%c[ui_gray_1]The ROMEO4 is the ultimate family of red-dot sights when fast, accurate target acquisition is a must. Whether it’s a moving target, dangerous game at full charge or a fast-breaking tactical situation, the ROMEO4 is always ready.
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_1]None
